title: woez
author: woez
content: I want to find a good Altcoin to invest in before the bull starts, also have a non-custodial exchange. This means, that we have complete control over our funds. If there is, please help convey it, because a lots of new altcoins was born every day.

comments.author: @sriyan
comments.body: Quote from: woez on August 02, 2023, 01:53:23 PMI want to find a good Altcoin to invest in before the bull starts, also have a non-custodial exchange. This means, that we have complete control over our funds. If there is, please help convey it, because a lots of new altcoins was born every day.I think you can try out the L2 tokens such as ARB and OP for the next bull run.  If you are asking about the non-custodial exchange, I think zigzag is the better option.

comments.author: Watcher.Yuguo
comments.body: PAWSWAP is currently the cheapest technology token, suitable for bottom huntingYou can go to the official twitter to find out

comments.author: Mr. Magkaisa
comments.body: Quote from: woez on August 02, 2023, 01:53:23 PMI want to find a good Altcoin to invest in before the bull starts, also have a non-custodial exchange. This means, that we have complete control over our funds. If there is, please help convey it, because a lots of new altcoins was born every day.       -    I just wanna ask something if you don't mind only. Did you do research in which of the altcoins are good to invest nowadays here in the crypto space? Or your just feel lazy that's why your asking and made a post like this here? Because,  all things that we want to know now is very easy to find the answer.We already have a google search, social media platform such as youtube where some of the influencers giving a review about the crypto in which is the best for them to buy or to invest.

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: Quote from: Watcher.Yuguo on August 02, 2023, 04:04:40 PMPAWSWAP is currently the cheapest technology token, suitable for bottom huntingYou can go to the official twitter to find outPawswap really looks great for investment since it is the lowest gem right now and this network is still very new and promising for long-term holding since its price is low and which reduces the risk level of investors since the price is at its lowest right now. The only risk in altcoin is price dump and that can only happen when you purchase the coin at its high price but for Pawswap, its price is low and its risk will be minimal with the tendency for the price to increase when there is a push on the market.

comments.author: shinratensei_
comments.body: I can only suggest you to accumulate L1 and L2 coins. I can give you example for L1EthereumTRON SOL, etcL2ARBOP, etcThe fact that if people will never ever leave from the L1 and L2 tokens caused by they were using it regularly to interact on its own blockchain. People were also mostly using L2 blockchain caused by how expensive ethereum fees is right now. L2 was offering an alternative solution in using ethereum in the secondary blockchain which has better scalability. that makes the fees become very cheap compared with using ethereum native blockchain itself.

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: Quote from: woez on August 02, 2023, 01:53:23 PMI want to find a good Altcoin to invest in before the bull starts, also have a non-custodial exchange. This means, that we have complete control over our funds.ETH.Quote from: woez on August 02, 2023, 01:53:23 PMIf there is, please help convey it, because a lots of new altcoins was born every day.Don't get confused with the new altcoins coming every day in the market. Many of them are like made to be cash outlets of the developers and the investors will be left behind. It's an easy way for them to swindle the money of these innocent investors like you. That's why if it seems too interesting to get on hand with them, you just don't have to do that and focus with some other altcoins that you're researching about. Make sure that you don't just listen to anybody but at the same time you're doing your own research as that's much needed for someone like you who looks further to the market before the bull run.

comments.author: avikz
comments.body: Quote from: woez on August 02, 2023, 01:53:23 PMI want to find a good Altcoin to invest in before the bull starts, also have a non-custodial exchange. This means, that we have complete control over our funds. If there is, please help convey it, because a lots of new altcoins was born every day.It's great that you understand that new altcoins are born every day and there are literally thousands of them. That's why always avoid investing in altcoins. Because most of them will have no value in the future. For me, the only altcoin I have invested in ETH. They are the pioneer in smart contract world and no one can beat them. So my portfolio contains only ETH and Bitcoin. No need for a third one to be honest.

comments.author: bittraffic
comments.body: There are lots of altcoins to buy. It's hard to figure out which ones going to shoot up first, however. Some of us buy a bit of this and a bit of that so they won't be left behind.For me. Doge is the most desirable for me as it's not forgotten still despite how much it dropped and I think the price is fair to get into right now. The more stash you have the more profit you make than just holding 10ETH. Quantity matters because even a small increment in price can equate to huge wins.

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: Quote from: woez on August 02, 2023, 01:53:23 PMI want to find a good Altcoin to invest in before the bull starts, also have a non-custodial exchange. This means, that we have complete control over our funds. If there is, please help convey it, because a lots of new altcoins was born every day.A non-custodial exchange or wallet does not mean that you are safe, as some cryptocurrencies can add a smart contract to freeze coin even if they are inside your wallet or burn it or not be able to withdraw after a certain date. you must be careful in choosing cryptocurrency, otherwise there is no difference between withdrawing your currencies from the platform or leave it here.Ethereum, Matic, DOGE, XLM, UNI, MoneroThis is not investment advice.

comments.author: Jocuserious
comments.body: Otherwise you should know that bull market is an uncertain thought that may surprise you suddenly but you should not spend all your money on the thought of getting rich.By the way there are many best altcoins and you can buy them if you want but in my opinion, if you want to buy because of the bull market then buy btc and eth. A best investment will be made which will keep you 100% safe and if the bull market comes back you will get a bag of best profits.

comments.author: Raflesia
comments.body: Quote from: woez on August 02, 2023, 01:53:23 PMI want to find a good Altcoin to invest in before the bull starts, also have a non-custodial exchange. This means, that we have complete control over our funds. If there is, please help convey it, because a lots of new altcoins was born every day.If it is altcoins that you are looking for then I think some of the big coins are the solution like ETH or maybe BNB but in this case I would like to suggest something else because if you really want to be more certain why not just be in bitcoin.Even though maybe in this case the return is smaller than with altcoins or most shitcoins that are always with their hype and pump and dump schemes but when talking about risk and feasibility of course bitcoin is still the first choice.IMO in this case bitcoin is the most feasible choice and must be prioritised after that just look for other alternatives that can support it like some of the altcoins I said earlier.

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: Quote from: bittraffic on August 02, 2023, 06:03:30 PMThere are lots of altcoins to buy. It's hard to figure out which ones going to shoot up first, however. Some of us buy a bit of this and a bit of that so they won't be left behind.For me. Doge is the most desirable for me as it's not forgotten still despite how much it dropped and I think the price is fair to get into right now. The more stash you have the more profit you make than just holding 10ETH. Quantity matters because even a small increment in price can equate to huge wins.I believe that because of the high risk associated with altcoins it is very I hard to give out a guide as to what will make a good potential altcoin for investment and this is something that has indeed led many into investing in shitcoin thinking that their good coins and for that we have to take out extra effort to make personal research on any coin before we put our money down on them and as an investor you have to be able to weight the risk and know what you are in for. Dogecoin as you mentioned is good but I think Dogecoin has outlived its popularity in the market if you looking for a coin that could give real-time value then Dogecoin should come not in the top 3 of your portfolio but that is my own analysis.

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Quote from: woez on August 02, 2023, 01:53:23 PMI want to find a good Altcoin to invest in before the bull starts, also have a non-custodial exchange. This means, that we have complete control over our funds. If there is, please help convey it, because a lots of new altcoins was born every day.With the lsdefi trend. I think the most coin that good is ethereum as there are plenty of lsd platform that benefited on ethereum staking. Also theres chance for some airdrops from remarkable defi project by boosting on their tvl. Well if you are into defi then eth is the best you could utilize while holding. But there are many projects that have potential in my opinion that could make x10 or more in the coming bull run.

comments.author: jossiel
comments.body: Why not Bitcoin? Do you have Bitcoin already or you're underestimating the growth that it will have for its price when the bull run is in?If it's just with altcoins, most of the dex have their own tokens and you should stick to the one that has high liquidity or else you may want to get into those cex tokens.

comments.author: goaldigger
comments.body: Quote from: woez on August 02, 2023, 01:53:23 PMI want to find a good Altcoin to invest in before the bull starts, also have a non-custodial exchange. This means, that we have complete control over our funds. If there is, please help convey it, because a lots of new altcoins was born every day.If beginner level I suggest to buy the top altcoins since most of them are potential altcoins to pump in the coming bull run and you can hold them on your own wallet where you can have the control. Top coins like ETH, LTC and XRP can give you peach of mind in the next bull run, I prefer to hold more of this than to buy a new project that are still risky since they still have no market exposure.

comments.author: wheelz1200
comments.body: Right now I'm bullish on polygon.  They have some pretty cool things in the works and has a relatively cheap platform compared to some of the other ones.  When every other project was stale or rugging everyone polygon team has kept building out its vision.  I'd take a serious look at picking some up.

comments.author: Wakate
comments.body: Quote from: woez on August 02, 2023, 01:53:23 PMI want to find a good Altcoin to invest in before the bull starts, also have a non-custodial exchange. This means, that we have complete control over our funds. If there is, please help convey it, because a lots of new altcoins was born every day. I will not give suggestions on the kind of coin you can likewise buy and keep for the bull run that is coming but I will like you to do research on your own so that you can make your financial decisions by yourself because the crypto market is very risky and anything can happen anytime so there is no 100% trusted coin in the market except for Bitcoin that is the brain behind cryptocurrency. There are so many coins in the market that you can buy and hold depending on what you want and how long it will take for the bull market to come to us. Take a step and do your own research so that you will be happy when those coins you finally but are in bull.

comments.author: JeffBrad12
comments.body: Quote from: jossiel on August 02, 2023, 09:35:39 PMWhy not Bitcoin? Do you have Bitcoin already or you're underestimating the growth that it will have for its price when the bull run is in?If it's just with altcoins, most of the dex have their own tokens and you should stick to the one that has high liquidity or else you may want to get into those cex tokens.I guess its not that many are underestimating it but realistically speaking not everyone have the money to invest in bitcoin with its high value.$100 investment will just be some measly investment even if it rise reaching its former all time high the investment won't grow that much because of course the investment amount isn't that much.frankly investing in altcoin is better for those with smaller capital for investment to start out then later on they could accumulate their bitcoin and holding it for long.after all bitcoin have lesser risk of just vanishing into thin air but it will certainly takes time.

comments.author: wxa7115
comments.body: Quote from: woez on August 02, 2023, 01:53:23 PMI want to find a good Altcoin to invest in before the bull starts, also have a non-custodial exchange. This means, that we have complete control over our funds. If there is, please help convey it, because a lots of new altcoins was born every day.According to your registration date you have been around this forum and this market since 2018, I would suppose that someone that has been around this market for so long should have an idea already of the type of coins they want to hold and the ones they should avoid.However since the halving is still so far away and the altcoin season is even farther away my recommendation is that you only hold strong altcoins, and only once we are incredibly close to the altcoin season you may decide to take a risk by investing in the coins you think could give you the best performance during that period of time.
